channel.title: Docs on Pay.ir Laravel Package
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Pay.ir Laravel Package

item.title: Installation
item.description: install with composer: composer require aries/seppay and publish config file and migration file: php artisan vendor:publish --provider='Aries\Seppay\SeppayServiceProvider' then migrate the database: php artisan migrate

item.title: Usage
item.description: you can set pay.ir api key on config/Seppay.php or on your .env file with SEP_API_KEY you have two way to payment: With Trait: import Payable Trait in a Model you want have Payment:

item.title: Update
item.description: You need to publish Service Provider again and run migration to update transaction table: php artisan vendor:publish --provider='Aries\Seppay\SeppayServiceProvider' php artisan migrate
